notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: C.S., A.J. and R.C. designed and conceived and designed the study with inputs from E.C., G.B. and S.B. V.G., E.B., B.C., M.H. and B.H. conducted the crop trials. M.H., B.H. and G.B. conducted the phytic acid analysis. B.H. and G.B. conducted the protein analysis.Â J.R. and A.J. conducted the EcoCrop modeling. C.S., M.H., B.H., G.B. and P.C.M. analysed the data, prepared the figures and wrote the manuscript and manuscript revisions. All authors were involved in revisions of the manuscript.
